name: GZCLP Tier 2 — 3×10→8→6 Progression (~7 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets x ~30-45s each + 2-3 min rest = ~6-8 min total
overview_and_execution: Start at 3×10 and add weight each workout until you cannot reach 30 total reps. Then switch to 3×8, then 3×6. After failing at 3×6, reset back to 3×10 at a slightly heavier weight.
example_application: If T2 is bench at 135 lb for 3×10, add 5 lb each session. Once you fail to hit 30 reps total, drop to 3×8 and continue progressing until you fail 24 reps.
important_notes: Maintain moderate rest (2–3 min). Each time you stall, drop the rep scheme and continue linear progression.
volume_metrics: Between 18 and 30 total reps (3 sets × 6–10 reps).
